vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ναίν (Rec. Ναΐν), ἡ, indecl. (Heb. נָאָה),
Nain, a village of Galilee: Luk.7:11.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Nain, "pleasant, delightful"
Nain, a town of Palestine, indeclinable, Lk. 7:11*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿因 这个專有地名在希伯來文的意思是 "美麗"
加利利的一個村莊, 位於小黑門的北側山腳 (路 7:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿因 这个专有地名在希伯来文的意思是 "美丽"
加利利的一个村庄, 位于小黑门的北侧山脚 (路 7:11)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Na-in « Tốt đẹp » : một làng trong Ga-li-lê. Xem H4998.
